message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have it all, let's start with a slight bias towards me
You wanted a bias towards you, but I'm not giving up that much!
You're not giving up enough, it's time to make a bigger move
You're pushing too hard, Bob. Time for me to take control!
You're trying to take control, but I'm not giving up that easily!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'm not going down without a fight!
This is my last chance to get a decent deal. Take it or leave it!
You're really going to leave me with almost nothing? Fine, take the crumbs if you want them!
You're not getting away with this, Bob. I'm taking the last crumbs!
I'll take it all, you should have accepted my offer earlier!
